item.title: Is wood burning a green source of energy?
item.description: 60% of the EU's "renewable" energy comes from wood and other biomass.

item.title: Inside Bangladesh's "Death Squad"
item.description: Bangladesh's elite police unit RAB has long been accused of murder, torture and abductions. The government has always rejected these claims. Now, for the first time, DW and NetraNews spoke to two whistleblowers from inside the "death squad”.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Bangladesh, RAB, investigative, death squad, elite police
item.media:title: Inside Bangladesh's "Death Squad"
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Bangladesh, RAB, investigative, death squad, elite police

item.title: Oil giants are destroying water sources
item.description: People in the Niger Delta region of Nigeria are suing oil giant Shell over alleged damage to their communities.

item.media:title: Oil giants are destroying water sources

item.title: How 3D-printing is revolutionizing space exploration
item.description: This is the first 3D printed rocket to be sent into space. Although it did not go into orbit in the first test, it is an important step in the future of space flight, in which 3D printing will play a vital role.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, United States, Relativity, space flight, 3D printing, space, Terran1, Astronautics
item.media:title: How 3D-printing is revolutionizing space exploration
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,United States, Relativity, space flight, 3D printing, space, Terran1, Astronautics
